title: College of Swords
content:
ic Inspiration

College of Swords is a Subclass of the Bard class in Baldur's Gate 3. Bards primary ability is Charisma, their saving throw proficiencies are Dexterity & Charisma, and they have a Hit Dice of 1d8. They have proficiency with Simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords and with Light armor.

A highly trained and skilled warrior, you use your prowess with words and weapons to fight and entertain in equal measure.
